name: Drug Drinker 5000
description:
*EPILEPSY WARNING*

Drink all the drugs cause it's cool I guess.

Mouse to move, click to shoot. Avoid shooting drugs. Shoot the apples to get rid of them. Collect the drugs and avoid the apples.

Also probably play in full screen because you can't lock the mouse in HTML 5 for obvious reasons.
